page.title: 12PATHHEAD:CLUBS AND SOCIETIES
page.content: ALTHOUGH PATHHEAD VILLAGE CAN ONLY CLAIM A POPULATION OF 900 THE LEISURE ACTIVITIES PAST AND PRESENT ARE MANY AND VARIED. ONE OF THE OLDEST CLUBS IN PATHHEAD WAS THE GOOD TEMPLARS SOCIETY WHICH STARTED IN 1871. THIS WAS FOLLOWED IN 1901 BY THE PATHHEAD FORD FANCIERS SOCIETY. THIS CLUB IS NOW KNOWN AS THE PIGEON CLUB. IN 1905 A BURNS CLUB MET 5 TIMES A YEAR. SIR THOMAS BORTHWICH, BARONET OF WHITBURGH OPENED PATHHEAD BOWLING CLUB IN 1909. IN 1856 THE HORTICULTURAL SOCIETY STARTED. ITS SHOW WAS HELD ON THE LAST SATURDAY IN AUGUST, THIS CLUB STILL EXISTS BUT IS NOW KNOWN AS THE PATHHEAD FLOWER SHOW. PRESENT DAY PATHHEAD IS WELL SERVED BY MANY CLUBS AND LEISURE ACTIVITIES. THESE CLUBS ARE; SNOOKER CLUB,PIGEON CLUB, RIFLE CLUB, BOWLING CLUB, BURNS CLUB, YOUTH
